name: Chicken meat
description: A versatile protein used in a wide range of cuisines and recipes.

ingredientSections.textContent: Can be grilled, roasted, boiled, or fried.
Popular in soups, stews, and as a filling for wraps or sandwiches.
A lean protein source rich in essential nutrients.

name: Egg
description: A protein-rich food used in both cooking and baking.

ingredientSections.textContent: Can be boiled, fried, poached, or used as a binder in recipes.
A key ingredient in dishes like omelets, cakes, and custards.
Offers versatility in both savory and sweet dishes.

name: Flour
description: A powder made by grinding grains, used in baking and cooking.

ingredientSections.textContent: Types include all-purpose, whole wheat, and gluten-free.
Essential for bread, pastries, and thickening sauces.
Common in both savory and sweet recipes.

name: Garlic
description: A pungent bulb that adds depth and flavor to dishes, known for its health benefits.

ingredientSections.textContent: Can be used minced, roasted, or whole for varying intensities of flavor.
A staple in Asian, European, and Middle Eastern cooking.
Known to have antimicrobial and anti-inflammatory properties.

name: Milk
description: A liquid dairy product used in a wide range of recipes.

ingredientSections.textContent: Can be consumed directly or used in sauces, soups, and desserts.
Available in different types like whole, skimmed, and plant-based alternatives.
Essential for baking, smoothies, and creamy dishes.

name: Olive oil
description: A healthy fat extracted from olives, used for cooking and dressing.

ingredientSections.textContent: Commonly used in frying, baking, and salad dressings.
Integral to Mediterranean and Middle Eastern cuisines.
Rich in monounsaturated fats and antioxidants.

name: Onion
description: A flavorful vegetable used as a base ingredient in countless dishes worldwide.

ingredientSections.textContent: Available in several varieties like red, white, and yellow.
Can be used raw in salads or caramelized for a sweet taste.
Often paired with garlic for a complementary flavor profile.

name: Rice
description: A staple grain that serves as a base for many dishes.

ingredientSections.textContent: Comes in varieties like basmati, jasmine, and brown rice.
Essential for Asian, Indian, and Latin American cuisines.
Used in both savory dishes like biryanis and desserts like rice pudding.

name: Salt
description: A universal seasoning essential for enhancing flavors.

ingredientSections.textContent: Used in cooking and baking for taste and preservation.
Available in various forms like table salt, sea salt, and kosher salt.
Plays a role in brining, curing, and seasoning.

name: Tomato
description: A juicy, red fruit often used as a vegetable, rich in vitamins A, C, and antioxidants.

ingredientSections.textContent: Commonly used in salads, sauces, and soups for its tangy flavor.
Available in various forms like fresh, canned, or pureed.
Essential for Mediterranean, Italian, and Indian cuisines.
